place.name: THURLBEAR
place.gazetteerText: THURLBEAR, a parish in Taunton district, Somerset; 3¾ miles SE of Taunton r. station. Post town, Taunton. Acres, 949. Real property, £1,021. Pop., 192. Houses, 34. The manor belongs to Lord Portman. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Bath and Wells. Value, £136.* Patron, Lord Portman. The church is Norman. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
